cards.rules: Once per turn: If you have no Treasures in play, gain a card costing up to 4 Coins.
Take your -1 Coin token. Gain 2 cards each costing up to 4 Coins.
Trash up to 2 cards you have in play.

+1 Buy
Once per turn: If your -1 Card token isn't on your deck, put it there and +1 Coin.
Draw 2 extra cards for your next hand.
Move your -2 Coins cost token to an Action Supply pile (cards from that pile cost 2 Coins less on your turns, but not less than 0 Coins).
Once per game: Set aside a non-Victory Action card from the Supply costing up to 4 Coins. Move your Estate token to it (your Estates gain the abilities and types of that card).
Move your +1 Action token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Action).
Once per turn: If the previous turn wasn't yours, take another turn after this one, in which you can't buy cards.
Move your +1 Card token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Card).
Once per turn: Turn your Journey token over (it starts face up); then if it's face up, choose up to 3 differently named cards you have in play and gain a copy of each.
Move your Trashing token to an Action supply pile (when you buy a card from that pile, you may trash a card from your hand.)
You may discard an Attack, two Curses, or six cards. If you do, gain a Gold.
Gain a Silver per Silver you have in play. Each other player puts his -1 Card token on his deck.

+1 Buy
Once per turn: Set aside a card from your hand, and put it into your hand at end of turn (after drawing).

+1 Buy
Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Discard 3 of them and put the rest back in any order.
Gain an Action card costing up to 4 Coins. Move your +1 Buy token to its pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Buy).
Trash up to 2 cards from your hand. Gain a Silver per card you trashed.
Move your +1 Coin token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Coin).

+2 Buys
When you gain a card this turn, you may put it on top of your deck.
Now and at the start of your next turn, choose one: +1 Coin; or trash a card from your hand; or gain a Silver.

+1 Card
+1 Action
+1 Coin
Discard any number of cards. You may gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin per card discarded, putting it on top of your deck.

Each other player takes his -1 Coin token. Now and at the start of your next turn:
+1 BuyWhile this is in play, cards cost 1 Coin less on your turns, but not less than 0 Coins.

+1 Card
+1 Action
At the start of your next turn, +1 Coin.When another player plays an Attack card, you may play this from your hand. (+1 Action has no effect if it's not your turn.)

1 Coin
When you play this, put it on your Tavern mat.Directly after resolving an Action, you may call this, for +2 Actions.

Put this on your Tavern mat.
Worth 4 Victory if on your Tavern mat at the end of the game (otherwise worth 0 Victory).

+1 Action
Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards, then discard 2 cards.
Put this on your Tavern mat.When you gain a card costing up to 6 Coins, you may call this, to gain a copy of that card.

+2 Cards
Set aside up to 2 cards from your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put them into your hand.

Turn your Journey token over (it starts face up). If it's face down, +1 Coin. If it's face up, +5 Coins, and each other player reveals the top card of his deck, trashes it if it costs from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and otherwise discards it and gains a Curse.

+1 Card
+1 Action
Put this on your Tavern mat.At the start of your turn, you may call this, to discard your hand and draw 5 cards.

Until your next turn, when any other player buys a card, he puts his hand on top of his deck in any order.
At the start of your next turn:
+3 Cards

At the start of each of your turns for the rest of the game:
+1 Card
(This stays in play.)

+2 Cards
+2 ActionsWhen you gain this, each other player draws a card.

+1 Card
+1 Action
Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Treasure, put it into your hand. If it's an Action or Victory card, gain a Magpie.

+1 Buy
+2 Coins
You may put your deck into your discard pile.When this is your first buy in a turn, gain a card costing up to 4 Coins, and each other player gains a copy of it.
Choose one: Put a Copper from your hand onto your Tavern mat; or +1 Coin per Copper on your Tavern mat.

+1 Card
+1 Action
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Treasure Hunter.

+1 Buy
+1 Coin
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Soldier.

+1 Card
+2 ActionsWhen you buy this, gain another Port.

+1 Buy
Turn your Journey token over (it starts face up). If it's face up, +5 Cards.

+1 Card
+1 Action
Put this on your Tavern mat.At the start of your turn, you may call this, to trash a card from your hand.

+1 Action
Trash this or a card from your hand. Look at a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the cost in Coins of the trashed card. Put one into your hand and discard the rest.

2 Coins
When you play this, each other player puts his -1 Card token on his deck.

+1 Action
Put this on your Tavern mat.Directly after resolving an Action, if it's still in play, you may call this, to replay that Action.

+1 Action
+1 Coin
Play up to 3 Treasures from your hand. Pay all of your Coins; +1 Card per Coin paid.

Until your next turn, when any other player buys a card, he gains a Curse.
At the start of your next turn:
+3 Coins

+1 Action
Put this on your Tavern mat.At the start of your turn, you may call this, to trash a card from your hand, gain a card costing up to 1 Coin more than it, and put that card into your hand.

2 Coins
When you play this, gain a Gold and a Copper.

+1 Buy
+4 Coins
Put this on your Tavern mat.At the end of your Buy phase, if you have at least 2 Coins unspent, you may discard this from your Tavern mat.

+1 Action
For the rest of the game, when another player plays an Attack, it doesn't affect you, and when you play an Action, +1 Action.
(This stays in play. This is not in the Supply.)

+2 Coins
Gain a Treasure.When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Champion.
(This is not in the Supply.)

+1 Action
+1 Coin
Gain a Silver per card the player to your right gained in his last turn.When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Warrior.
(This is not in the Supply.)

+2 Cards
For each Traveller you have in play (including this), each other player discards the top card of his deck and trashes it if it costs 3 Coins or 4 Coins.When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Hero.
(This is not in the Supply.)

You may play an Action card from your hand twice. Gain a copy of it.When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Teacher.
(This is not in the Supply.)

+2 Cards
+1Action
Discard a card.When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Disciple.
(This card is not in the Supply.)

+2 Coins
+1 Coin per other Attack you have in play. Each other player with 4 or more cards in hand discards a card.When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Fugitive.
This is not in the Supply.)

Put this on your Tavern mat.At the start of your turn, you may call this, to move your +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Buy, or +1 Coin token to an Action Supply pile you have no tokens on (when you play a card from that pile, you first get that bonus).
(This is not in the Supply.)
Worth 1 Potion.

+2 Cards
+1 Action

When you discard this from play, you may put this on top of your deck if you have a Potion in play.

+1 Card
+1 Action

Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Coppers and Potions into your hand. Put the other cards back on top of your deck in any order.

+1 Action

Trash a card from your hand.
+1 Card per Coin it costs.
+2 Cards if it has Potion in its cost.

+1 Card
+1 Action

Each other player gains a curse.

Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Action cards other than Golem Cards.
Discard the other cards, then play the Action cards in either order.

+1 Buy
+1 Coin

When you discard this from play, you may put one of your Treasures from play on top of your deck.

When you play this, count your deck and discard pile.
Worth 1 Coin per 5 cards total between them (rounded down).

The player to your left takes an extra turn after this one, in which you can see all cards he can and make all decisions for him.
Any cards he would gain on that turn, you gain instead; any cards of his that are trashed are set aside and returned to his discard pile at end of turn.

+1 Action

Each player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice. Then reveal cards from the top of your deck until revealing one that isn't an Action.
Put all of your revealed cards into your hand.

Trash a card from your hand.
If it is an...
Action card, gain a Duchy
Treasure card, gain a Transmute
Victory card, gain a Gold

+2 Actions

You may gain an Action card costing up to 5 Coins.
Worth 1 Victory for every 3 Action cards in your deck (rounded down).
Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Treasure cards. Put those Treasure cards into your hand and discard the other revealed cards.
Gain a silver card; put it on top of your deck. Each other player reveals a Victory card from his hand and puts it on his deck (or reveals a hand with no Victory cards).

+1 Action

Discard any number of cards. +1 Card per card discarded.

+2 Coins

You may immediately put your deck into your discard pile.
Trash up to 4 cards from your hand.

+4 Cards
+1 Buy

Each other player draws a card.
Trash this card. Gain a card costing up to 5 Coins.

+2 Actions
+1 Buy
+2 Coins
Variable, Worth 1 Victory for every 10 cards in your deck (rounded down).

+2 Cards
+1 Action
Draw until you have 7 cards in hand. You may set aside any Action cards drawn this way, as you draw them; discard the set aside cards after you finish drawing.

+1 Card
+1 Action
+1 Buy
+1 Coin

+2 Coins

Each other player discards down to 3 cards in his hand.
Trash a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a Treasure card costing up to 3 Coins more; put it into your hand.

+2 Cards

When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, you are unaffected by that Attack.
Trash a Copper from your hand. If you do, +3 Coins.
Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 2 Coins more than the trashed card.
+3 Cards

+1 Card
+1 Action

Each player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice.

Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck. If they revealed any Treasure cards, they trash one of them that you choose. You may gain any or all of these trashed cards. They discard the other revealed cards.
Choose an Action card in your hand. Play it twice.

+1 Card
+2 Actions

+2 Cards

Each other player gains a Curse card.

+1 Buy
+2 Coins
Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins.
1 Coin.
-1 Victory.
3 Victory.
1 Victory.
3 Coins.
6 Victory.
2 Coins.
Worth 2 VP for every 5 differently named cards in your deck (rounded down)

+2 Actions
Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal an Action or Treasure card. Put that card into your hand and discard the other cards.

+2 Coins
Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until he reveals a Victory or Curse card. He puts it on top and discards the other revealed cards.

+1 Card
+1 Action

You may discard a card; If you do, +1 Action.
You may discard a card; If you do, +1 Buy.
Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck, then discard them. +1 Coin per differently named card revealed.

0 Coins
When you play this, gain a card costing up to 1 Coin per differently named card you have in play, counting this. If it's a Victory card, trash this.

+1 Buy
+3 Coins
Discard 2 CardsWhen another player plays an Attack card, you may set this aside from your hand. If you do, then at the start of your next turn, +1 Card and return this to your hand.

+1 Card
+1 Action
Reveal your hand. Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a card that isn't a duplicate of one in your hand. Put it into your hand and discard the rest.

+2 Coins
Each other player discards the top card of his deck. If it's a Victory card he gains a Curse. Otherwise he gains a copy of the discarded card or you do, your choice.

+1 Action
Reveal your hand. If there are no duplicate cards in it, +3 Cards. Otherwise, +1 Card.
Do this twice: Trash a card from your hand, then gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than the trashed card.

+1 Action
Each player may reveal a Province from his hand. If you do, discard it and gain a Prize (from the Prize pile) or a Duchy, putting it on top of your deck. If no-one else does, +1 Card +1 Coin.

+2 Cards
Discard 2 cards. Each other player may reveal a Bane card from his hand.
If he doesn't, he gains a Curse.

Setup: Add an extra Kingdom card pile costing 2 Coins or 3 Coins to the Supply. Cards from that pile are Bane cards.

+1 Action
Gain a Gold, putting it on top of your deck.
(This is not in the Supply.)

Worth 2 Coins.
When you play this, +1 Coin per unused Action you have (Action, not Action card).
(This is not in the Supply.)

+2 Cards
Gain an Estate. Each other player gains a Curse and discards down to 3 cards in hand.
(This is not in the Supply.)

+1 Buy
While this is in play, cards cost 2 Coins less, but not less than 0 Coins.
(This is not in the Supply.)
Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 5 Coins.
Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins, putting it on top of your deck.

Play this as if it were an Action card in the Supply costing less than it that you choose.
This is that card until it leaves play.

+1 Card
+2 Actions
Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile.
Gain 3 Coppers, putting them into your hand.When another player plays an Attack card, you may discard this. If you do, gain two Silvers, putting one on top of your deck.
Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Choose one: Put them into your hand; or discard them and +3 Cards.When you trash this, gain a cheaper card.

Choose one: Discard 2 cards; or put a card from your hand on top of your deck; or gain a Copper.
Choose one: +3 Coins; or trash your hand; or gain a Duchy.

1 Coin
+1 Buy
When you play this, you may play a Treasure from your hand twice. If you do, trash that Treasure.

+2 Cards
Each other player gains a Ruins. You may play a Cultist from your hand.When you trash this, +3 Cards.

+5 Coins
You may trash an Action card from your hand. If you don't, trash this.When you gain this, gain 2 Ruins.
Worth 1 Victory for every 3 Silvers in your deck (round down).When you trash this, gain 3 Silvers.

+1 Action
+1 Buy
Trash a card from your hand. +1 Coin per differently named Treasure in the trash.

+1 Card
+2 Actions
When you trash this, put it into your hand.
Choose one: Gain a card from the trash costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, putting it on top of your deck; or trash an Action card from your hand and gain a card costing up to 3 Coins more than it.

Look through your discard pile. You may trash a card from your discard pile or hand that is not a Treasure. Gain a card costing up to 3 Coins.When you discard this from play, if you did not buy any cards this turn, trash this and gain a Madman from the Madman pile.
+4 CardsWhen you trash this, gain a Duchy or 3 Estates.

+1 Card
+1 Action
Reveal the top card of your deck; you may discard it. Either way, if it is an:
 Action card, +1 Action
 Treasure card, +1 Coin
 Victory card, +1 Card

+1 Card
+1 Action
+1 Coin
Trash a card from your hand.
Shuffle the Knight pile before each game with it. Keep it face down except for the top card, which is the only one that can be bought or gained.
Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile. Each other player gains a Ruins.

+1 Card
+1 Action
+1 Buy
When one of your cards is trashed, you may discard this from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold.

+1 Action
+2 Coins
Name a card. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put it into your hand.

Trash this. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand reveals his hand and discards a card that you choose.
Gain 2 Spoils from the Spoils pile.

+4 Coins
Reveal your hand. -1 Coin per Treasure card in your hand, to a minimum of 0 Coins.
You may play an Action card from your hand twice. Trash it. Gain an Action card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it.

+1 Card
+1 Action
Gain a Rats. Trash a card from your hand other than a Rats (or reveal a hand of all Rats).When you tash this, +1 Card.

+1 Action
Name a card. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Victory card that is not the named card. Discard the other cards. Trash the Victory card and gain a Victory card costing up to 3 Coins more than it.

+2 Coins
If there are any cards in the trash costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, gain one of them. Otherwise, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest.

+1 Action
Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal one costing 3 Coins or more. Put that card into your hand and discard the rest.

+1 Coins
You may put your deck into your discard pile. Look through your discard pile and put one card from it on top of your deck.

+1 Coin
Choose one: +2 Actions; or +2 Buys; or gain a Silver.When you trash this, gain an Attack card.

+1 Buy
Discard any number of cards. +1 Card per card discarded. Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded the second time.

+1 Card
+1 Action
Each other player discards down to 4 cards in hand.When you play another Attack card with this in play, you may trash this. If you do, gain a mercenary from the Mercenary pile.

+1 Card
+1 Action
Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Curse, Ruins, Shelter, or Victory card, put it into your hand.

+1 Card
+2 Actions
Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put the Actions back on top in any order and discard the rest.

You may trash up to 2 cards from your hand.
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

2 Victory
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

+2 Actions
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

You may gain a card costing up to 3 Coins.
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

+2 Coins
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

+1 Card
+1 Action
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

+2 Cards
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

+2 Buys
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.
Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.When you trash this, gain a Gold.

+2 Actions
Return this to the Madman pile. If you do, +1 Card per card in your hand.
(This card is not in the supply.)
You may trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, +2 Cards, +2 Coins, and each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand. (This is not in the Supply.)
+1 Coin
+1 Card
+1 Buy
+1 Action
Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Discard them or put them back in any order.
When you buy a Victory card, you may trash this from your hand.
+2 Actions

0 Victory
When you trash this, +1 Card.

3 Coins
When you play this, return it to the Spoils pile.
(This is not in the Supply.)

1VP
When you gain or trash this, +1VP and gain a Silver

5VP
When you gain this, reveal your hand. +1VP per Victory card in your hand and/or in play.

2VP
When you gain this during your turn, gain a Gold, and each other player with 5 or more cards in hand puts 2 cards from their hand onto their deck.

Worth 1 Coin
Worth 1VP per Castle you have.
Worth 2VP per Castle you have.

3VP
Discard any number of Victory cards. +2 coins per card discarded.
Trash this or a Castle from your hand. If you do, gain a Castle

4VP
When you gain this, gain a Duchy or 3 Estates
You may trash an Action card from your hand. If you do, gain an Action card costing up to 6 coins.
Look through your discard pile. Shuffle all but up to 5 cards from it into your deck. Gain a Duchy.
Gain 2 Coppers and a non-Victory card costing up to 5 coins.
Gain 2 Silvers. +1 VP per Silver you've gained this turn.

+1 Buy
Gain a Silver
Gain a Province. If you do, +9VP
After this turn, put all cards from your deck and discard pile into your hand, trash any number, shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw 5 cards.
Gain a Curse. If you do, trash a card from your hand. +1VP per 1 Coin it cost.

+1VP
Trash a Victory card from the Supply.

Add 2D to a Supply pile.
Setup: Add 1D to each Supply pile. When a player buys a card, they take the Debt from its pile.
Gain an Estate. If you did, +1 VP per card you've gained this turn.

+1VP
Gain a Gold.
If your deck and discard pile are empty, gain 3 Golds.

+1 Action
Set aside the top 3 cards of your deck face down (you may look at them). Now and at the start of your next two turns, put one into your hand.

Worth 6 Coins
+1 Buy
When you discard this from play, take 6 Debt and then you may pay off Debt.
Sort the Castle pile by cost, putting the more expensive Castles on the bottom. For a 2-Player game, use only one of each Castle. Only the top card of the pile can be gained or bought.

+1 Coin
Trash a card from your hand. If it costs 3 or more, each other player gains a Curse. If it's a Treasure, each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.

+1 Action
Reveal the top card of your deck and put it into your hand. The player to your left reveals the top card of their deck. If your card costs more, +1 coin and +1VP

+2 Actions
Reveal your hand. +1 Card per Action card revealed.
If it's your Action phase, you may play an Action from your hand twice. If it's your Buy phase, you may play a Treasure from your hand twice.

+2 Cards
+2 Actions
You may reveal a Gold or Plunder from your hand. If you do not, set this aside, and return it to the Supply at the start of Clean-up.

Until your next turn, the first time each other player plays an Action card on their turn, they get +1 Card and +1 Action instead of following its instructions.
At the start of your next turn, +2 Cards
Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins. You may trash this. If you do, gain a card costing up to 4 Coins.

+1 Buy
If there are 4VP or more on the Farmers' Market Supply pile, take them and trash this. Otherwise, add 1VP to the pile and then +1 coin per 1VP on the pile.

+3 Cards
+1 Action
Discard 2 cards.
When you buy this, +1 Buy.

+2 Coins
Reveal a card from your hand. The player to your left may reveal a copy from their hand. If they do not, +1 Coin and trash a Gladiator from the Supply.

+1 Card
+1 Action
While this is in play, when you gain a Victory card, +1VP.

+3 Coins
You may reveal a Gold from your hand. If you do, each other player discards down to 2 cards in hand, then draws a card.
Play this as if it were an Action card in the Supply costing up to 5 coins. This is that card until it leaves play.

+1 Card
+1 Action
Reveal the top card of your deck. If it costs 5 coins or more, put it into your hand.

+5 Cards
Reveal your hand; discard the Coppers.

Trash a card from your hand. If it's an:
 Action Card: +2 Cards, +2 Actions
 Treasure Card: +2 Coins
 Victory Card: +2 VP

+1 Card
+1 Action
Look through your discard pile. You may reveal a Copper from it and put it into your hand.

+1 VP
Trash from m1 to 3 differently named cards from your hand. Add 1VP to the Temple Supply pile.
When you gain this, take the VP from the Temple Supply pile.

+2 Actions
+1 Buy
+1 Coin
When you gain this, put it into your hand, +1 Action, and if it's your Buy phase return to your Action phase.

When you gain a Treasure, move 1VP from its pile to this.
When you gain a Victory card, take the VP from this.
Setup: Put 8VP on the Silver and Gold piles.

At the start of your Buy phase, you may discard an Action card. If you do, take 2VP from here.
Setup: Put 6VP here per player.
When scoring, -2VP for each Silver and each Gold you have.

When you buy a card, if you have 2 coins or more left, take 2VP from here.
Setup: Put 6VP here per player.

When you end your turn without having gained a card, take 2VP from here.
Setup: Put 6VP here per player.

When you gain a Victory card, take 2VP from here.
Setup: Put 6VP here per player.

When you buy an Action card, if you have a copy of it in play, take 2VP from here.
Setup: Put 6VP here per player.

When you gain an Action, move 1VP from its pile to this. When you buy a Curse, take the VP from this.
Setup: Put 2VP on each non-Gathering Action Supply pile.
When scoring, 15VP if you have at least 10 Coppers.
When scoring, 5VP per differently named Treasure you have, that you have more copies of than each other player, or tied for most.

When you gain a 2nd card in one of your turns, take 2VP from here.
Setup: Put 6VP here per player.
When you are the first player to gain a Province, after that turn, each player bids once, up to 40 Debt, ending with you. High bidder gets 8VP and takes the Debt they bid.
When scoring, 2VP per differently named card you have.

When scoring, 2VP per card you have from the chosen pile.
Setup: Choose a random Action Supply pile.
When scoring, 4VP per differently named Action card you have 3 or more copies of.
When scoring, 3VP per set you have of Copper - Silver - Gold.
When you trash a card, +1VP
When scoring, 1VP per non-Victory card you have from an empty Supply pile.
When scoring, 3VP per copy you have of the 2nd most common Action card among your cards (if it's a tie, count either).
When scoring, -1VP per card you have after the first 15.
When scoring, -3VP per card you have exactly one copy of.

Worth 1 Coin
When you gain or trash this, gain a Silver; if it is your Buy phase, put the Silver on your deck, otherwise put it into your hand.

Worth 2 Coins
+1 VP

+1 Buy
When you play this, double your coins if you haven't yet this turn.
When you gain this, gain a Gold per Gladiator you have in play.

+1 Card
+1 Action
+1 Coin
When you gain this, if you have at least 5 Action cards in play, +2 VP

+1 Card
+3 Actions
Look through your discard pile. You may reveal a Settlers from it and put it into your hand.

+1 Action
Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one of them. Discard that card. Put the other cards into your hand.

+1 Card

Take a Coin token.Setup: Each player takes a Coin token.
